SEARCH
Package org.domain.controllers

Class ProductManager

java.lang.Object
org.domain.controllers.ProductManager
public class ProductManager extends Object
ProductManager Manages multiple product lists, providing methods to add, remove, and edit products. Keeps a similarity map between all the products in the catalog and the product lists.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Sergio Shmyhelskyy Yaskevych (sergio.shmyhelskyy@estudiantat.upc.edu)

    • getInstance

      Gets the singleton instance of the ProductManager.

      the singleton instance

    • getInstance

      public static ProductManager getInstance(Map<String,Product> catalog, Map<String,Map<String,Double>> similarities)
      Gets the singleton instance of the ProductManager.
      Parameters:
      catalog - the product catalog (key: product name, value: product object)
      similarities - the similarity map (key: product name, value: map of similar products and their similarity scores)
      Returns:
      the singleton instance

    • addProductToCatalog

      public void addProductToCatalog(String productName, String category, double price, int amount, ArrayList<Pair<String,Double>> similarities) throws ProductException
      Adds a unique product to the supermarket's product catalog.
      Parameters:
      productName - the name of the product
      category - the category of the product
      price - the price of the product
      amount - the amount of the product
      similarities - a list of product names and similarity values (key: product name, value: similarity score)
      Throws:
      ProductException - if the product already exists in the catalog \pre The product must not already exist in the catalog. \post The product is added to the catalog if it does not already exist.

    • removeProductFromCatalog

      public void removeProductFromCatalog(String productName) throws ProductException
      Removes a product from the catalog.
      Parameters:
      productName - the name of the product to remove
      Throws:
      ProductException - if the product does not exist in the catalog \pre The product must exist in the catalog. \post The product is removed from the catalog if it exists.

    • updateProductFromCatalog

      public void updateProductFromCatalog(String productName, String category, double price, int amount, ArrayList<Pair<String,Double>> similarities) throws ProductException
      Updates a product in the catalog.
      Parameters:
      productName - the name of the product
      category - the category of the product
      price - the price of the product
      amount - the amount of the product
      similarities - a list of product names and similarity values (key: product name, value: similarity score)
      Throws:
      ProductException - if the product does not exist in the catalog, the category is invalid, the price is not positive, the name parameter is empty or the amount is not positive

    • increaseProductQuantity

      public int increaseProductQuantity(String productName, int amount) throws ProductException
      Increases the quantity of a product in the catalog.
      Parameters:
      productName - the name of the product
      amount - the amount to increase
      Returns:
      the remaining amount of the product
      Throws:
      ProductException - if the product does not exist or the amount is not positive \pre The product must exist in the catalog and the amount must be positive. \post The quantity of the product is increased by the specified amount.

    • decreaseProductQuantity

      public int decreaseProductQuantity(String productName, int amount) throws ProductException
      Decreases the quantity of a product in the catalog.
      Parameters:
      productName - the name of the product
      amount - the amount to decrease
      Returns:
      the remaining amount of the product
      Throws:
      ProductException - if the product does not exist, the amount is invalid, or the resulting amount is negative \pre The product must exist in the catalog and the amount must be valid. \post The quantity of the product is decreased by the specified amount if valid.

      Parameters:
      productName - the name of the product
      percentage - the discount percentage to apply
      Throws:
      ProductException - if the product does not exist in the catalog \pre The product must exist in the catalog. \post The discount is applied to the product.

    • createProductList

      public boolean createProductList(String listName, String category) throws ProductListException
      Creates a new product list in the supermarket.
      Parameters:
      listName - the name of the product list
      category - the category of the product list
      Returns:
      true if the list was created, false if it already exists
      Throws:
      ProductListException - if the product list already exists \pre The product list must not already exist and the product must exist in the catalog. \post The product list is created with the specified product if both exist.

      public void removeProductLists()
      Removes all product lists charged in the system (current user).

    • addProductToList

      public void addProductToList(String listName, String productName) throws ProductListException, ProductException
      Adds an existing product from the catalog to a specific product list.
      Parameters:
      listName - the name of the product list to which the product will be added
      productName - the name of the product to add
      Throws:
      ProductListException - if the product list does not exist
      ProductException - if the product does not exist \pre The product and the product list must exist. \post The product is added to the specified product list if both exist.

    • addProductsToList

      public void addProductsToList(List<String> productNames, String listName) throws ProductListException, ProductException
      Adds multiple existing products from the catalog to a specific product list.

      This method iterates over a list of product names and adds each product to the specified product list. If any product does not exist in the catalog or the list, the corresponding exception is thrown.

      Parameters:
      productNames - a list of product names to add
      listName - the name of the product list to which the products will be added
      Throws:
      ProductListException - if the product list does not exist
      ProductException - if any product does not exist in the catalog or already exists in the list \pre The products and the product list must exist. \post The products are added to the specified product list if both exist.

    • removeProductFromList

      public void removeProductFromList(String listName, String productName) throws ProductListException, ProductException
      \brief Removes a product from a specified product list. This method removes a product from a specified product list. If the product is successfully removed and the list becomes empty, the list is also removed.
      Parameters:
      listName - The name of the product list from which the product will be removed.
      productName - The name of the product to remove from the list.
      Throws:
      ProductListException - If the product list does not exist.
      ProductException - If the product does not exist in the list. \pre The product list and the product must exist. \post The product is removed from the specified product list. If the list becomes empty after the removal, the list is also removed.

    • removeProductsFromList

      public void removeProductsFromList(List<String> productNames, String listName) throws ProductListException, ProductException
      Removes multiple products from a specified product list.

      This method iterates over a list of product names and removes each product from the specified product list. If any product does not exist in the list, the corresponding exception is thrown.

      Parameters:
      productNames - a list of product names to remove
      listName - the name of the product list from which the products will be removed
      Throws:
      ProductListException - if the product list does not exist
      ProductException - if any product does not exist in the list \pre The products and the product list must exist. \post The products are removed from the specified product list if both exist.

    • applyDiscountToList

      public void applyDiscountToList(String listName, double percentage) throws ProductListException
      Applies a discount to a specific list and logs the modification.
      Parameters:
      listName - the name of the product list
      percentage - the discount percentage to apply
      Throws:
      ProductListException - if the product list does not exist \pre The product list must exist. \post The discount is applied to all products in the specified list.

      Shows the similarities between products.
      Returns:
      a string representation of the similarities

    • setSimilarity

      public void setSimilarity(String product1, String product2, double similarity) throws ProductException
      Adds a similarity between two products.
      Parameters:
      product1 - the name of the first product
      product2 - the name of the second product
      similarity - the similarity value
      Throws:
      ProductException - if either product does not exist \pre Both products must exist. \post The similarity between the two products is added.

    • removeSimilarity

      public void removeSimilarity(String product1) throws ProductException
      Removes a similarity between the products with a specific product.
      Parameters:
      product1 - the product name.
      Throws:
      ProductException - if either product does not exist. \pre The product must exist to be removed. \post The similarity between the products is removed.

    • getSimilarity

      public Double getSimilarity(String product1, String product2)
      Gets the similarity between two products.
      Parameters:
      product1 - the name of the first product
      product2 - the second product
      Returns:
      the similarity value between the two products, or null if not found \pre Both products must exist. \post Returns the similarity between the two products.

      Parameters:
      productName - the name of the product
      Returns:
      a map of product names and their similarity scores
      Throws:
      ProductException - if the product does not exist
